docs.summary: Manage Waitlists.

params.name: registrationId
params.doc: Registration to book.

params.name: couponCode
params.doc: Coupon code to apply to this booking at checkout.

params.name: flowControlSettings
params.doc: Sets the book flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

params.name: planSelection
params.doc: Selected paid plan to apply to this booking at checkout.

docs.summary:
Books a site member into the session for which they are waitlisted (waiting resource), and the associated booking is checked out.
 Waitlist registration status is changed to ENROLLED.
> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Manage Bookings permissions scope

extra.description: Books a site member into the session for which he was waitlisted, according to the provided registration Id.

params.name: couponCode
params.doc: Coupon code to apply to this booking at checkout.

params.name: registrationId
params.doc: Registration to book.

params.name: flowControlSettings
params.doc: Sets the book flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

params.name: planSelection
params.doc: Selected paid plan to apply to this booking at checkout.

docs.summary:
Books a site member into the session for which they are waitlisted (waiting resource), and the associated booking is checked out.
 Waitlist registration status is changed to ENROLLED.
> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Manage Bookings permissions scope

extra.description: Books a site member into the session for which he was waitlisted, according to the provided registration Id.

docs.summary:
Removes a site member's registration to a waitlist (and cancels the associated pending-state booking).  
 If a spot has become available for booking and the server is SUGGESTING registration to waitlist registrants, the next member registered to the waitlist will receive an invitation to the opened spot.  
> **Permissions**   
> This endpoint requires the Manage Bookings permissions scope

extra.description: Removes a site member's registration to a waitlist by the registration Id.

params.name: waitingResources
params.doc: List of sessions (waitingResources) with active waitlists.

docs.summary:
Returns a list of waitlisted entries.
 Each WaitingListEntry returned holds the current Waitlist registrations, configuration and suggesting status.
> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Read Bookings - Public Data permissions scope

extra.description: Returns the wait list of the waiting resource.

params.name: waitingResources
params.doc: List of sessions (waitingResources) with active waitlists.

docs.summary:
Returns a list of waitlisted entries.
 Each WaitingListEntry returned holds the current Waitlist registrations, configuration and suggesting status.
> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Read Bookings - Public Data permissions scope

extra.description: Returns the wait list of the waiting resource.

params.name: formInfo
params.doc:
Participant information as filled in the booking form (required).
 Contains contact details and other form fields specified by the owner for this 'waiting resource' (service).

params.name: flowControlSettings
params.doc: Sets the cancel flow behavior, some settings required permissions.

params.name: presentedEndTime
params.doc: Service end time presented to the user. For validation - Optional.

params.name: waitingResource
params.doc:
Resource to be waitlisted for.
 Currently only supports session ID.

params.name: presentedStartTime
params.doc: Service start time as presented to the user. For validation - Optional.

docs.summary:
Registers a site member to a waitlist. 
 If the requested session does not have a waitlist, or if the waitlist is already full, an error is received.
> **Permissions**   
> This endpoint requires the Manage Bookings permissions scope

extra.description: Adds a contact details to a wait list and return its registration Id.

Participant information as filled in the booking form (required).

Registers a site member to a waitlist. 
 If the requested session does not have a waitlist, or if the waitlist is already full, an error is received.
> **Permissions**

members.name: id
members.doc: The id of the form field as defined in the form entity

members.name: value
members.doc: Value that was submitted per this field

members.name: label
members.doc: Snapshot of the form field label during form submission.

messages.name: customFormFieldsMapEntry
messages.displayName: custom Form Fields Map Entry Object

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs. Other custom field values that were specified by the user. In the form of field_id to value mapping.
 Deprecated. Is being replaced with additional_fields.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: contactDetails
members.doc: The contact details describing the owner of this booking.

members.name: customFormFields
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. Other custom field values that were specified by the user. In the form of field_id to value mapping.
 Deprecated. Is being replaced with additional_fields.

members.name: additionalFields
members.doc: Additional custom fields submitted with the form.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact email. Mandatory field. used to create a new contact or get existing one from Contacts Service.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact last name.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact first name.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact country of origin

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact identifier used in Contact Service.  this field is read-only except in Book method.

members.name: address
members.doc: Contact address.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Contact time-zone.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact phone.

members.name: rateLabel
members.doc: The label represent this booking rate, or free/custom if unspecified.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: The number of participants register to this booking. Mandatory field.

members.name: attendanceStatus
members.doc: Indicated whether the booked contact attended the session

members.name: numberOfAttendees
members.doc: The number of attendees that attended. Can be more than 1 if the booking was with accompanied party

members.name: amount
members.doc: The price amount

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency

members.name: downPayAmount
members.doc: Optional. Represents a required down payment as part of the transaction process.

members.name: state
members.doc: Checkout current state.

members.name: wixPayDetails
members.doc: [DEPRECATED]. USE wix_pay_multiple_details.

members.name: paidPlanDetails
members.doc: Paid plan details used to pay for the booking.

members.name: balance
members.doc: The booking Balance.

members.name: id
members.doc: Checkout identifier.

members.name: wixPayMultipleDetails
members.doc: In case of wix-pay service, holds all payment history for a booking.

members.name: couponDetails
members.doc: temporarily in-out , when available indicate coupon usage.

members.name: finalPrice
members.doc:
The final calculated price.
 Calculated using the service price multiplied by the booking's number of participants deducted any discount (coupons, etc.)

members.name: amountReceived
members.doc: Amount paid.

members.name: planName
members.doc: Plan name

members.name: plan
members.doc: Plan details

members.name: transactionId
members.doc: Transaction id created in Paid Plans Benefit service.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Cashier order Id

members.name: orderAmount
members.doc: The order amount we issued to Cashier.

members.name: orderStatus
members.doc: Transaction status

members.name: paymentVendorName
members.doc: Payment vendor name

members.name: txId
members.doc: Cashier transaction Id

members.name: address
members.doc: The address as set by the owner. Valid only when location_type is OWNER_CUSTOM.

messages.name: labeledPriceOptionsMapEntry
messages.displayName: labeled Price Options Map Entry Object

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type ref

members.name: labeledPriceOptions
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: priceText
members.doc: User defined textual price. Optional.

members.name: platform
members.doc: The platform from which a booking was created

members.name: actor
members.doc: The actor that created this booking

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: The appDefId of the application that created this booking

members.name: appName
members.doc: The name of the application that created this booking, as saved in Wix-dev-center at the time of booking

docs.summary: The booking domain object

members.name: formInfo
members.doc:
Form info submitted when booking. Contains contact details, participants, other form fields specified by the owner for the choosen service.
 Contact information. Mandatory. contains contact details, participants, other form fields specified by the owner for the choosen service.

members.name: paymentDetails
members.doc: Payment Details. Optional. On Create, in case of a given empty field, this booking will not be send to checkout for payment.

members.name: externalUserId
members.doc: External Id provided by the client on creation

members.name: attendanceInfo
members.doc: Attendance Info. Optional

members.name: created
members.doc: Created timestamp. Read-only.

members.name: rate
members.doc: The price options offered to book this session at the time of booking.

members.name: location
members.doc: Geographic location of the session.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: onlineConference
members.doc: Online conference information

members.name: guestUrl
members.doc: participant url

members.name: providerId
members.doc: online conference provider identifier

members.name: password
members.doc: online conference password

members.name: start
members.doc: The start time of the session.

members.name: end
members.doc: The end time of the session.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc: The start time of the first session.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc: The end time of the last session.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email at the time of booking. Optional.

members.name: ignoreWaitlistCapacity
members.doc:
when defined as true, skips the waitlist defined capacity policy.
 required BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permission.

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the cancel flow behavior, some settings required permissions.

members.name: presentedEndTime
members.doc: Session end time as presented to the user. For validation - optional.

members.name: presentedStartTime
members.doc: Session start time as presented to the user. For validation - optional.

members.name: registrationId
members.doc: this is also the booking ID.

members.name: ignoreWaitlistCapacity
members.doc:
when defined as true, skips the waitlist defined capacity policy.
 required BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permission.

members.name: formInfo
members.doc:
Participant information as filled in the booking form (required).
 Contains contact details and other form fields specified by the owner for this 'waiting resource' (service).

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the cancel flow behavior, some settings required permissions.

members.name: presentedEndTime
members.doc: Service end time presented to the user. For validation - Optional.

members.name: waitingResource
members.doc:
Resource to be waitlisted for.
 Currently only supports session ID.

members.name: presentedStartTime
members.doc: Service start time as presented to the user. For validation - Optional.

members.name: forceEnrollment
members.doc:
when defined as true, enroll the specifid registration to the session, with no regard to the registration status.
 required BBOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY and BOOKINGS.OVERRIDE_AVAILABILITY permission.

members.name: forceInPersonCheckout
members.doc:
when defined as true, checkout the booking as "in-person" method, that doesnt required online payment.
 required BOOKINGS.MANAGE_PAYMENTS permission.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon code to apply to this booking at checkout.

members.name: registrationId
members.doc: Registration to book.

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the book flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

members.name: planSelection
members.doc: Selected paid plan to apply to this booking at checkout.

members.name: booking
members.doc:
Checked-out booking.
 (Online-payments can only be completed in the Wix Bookings UI.)

members.name: bookingId
members.doc: Registration's associated booking

members.name: id
members.doc: Registration ID

members.name: availableActions
members.doc: Currently available actions for this registration.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Registration status
 WAITING - Registrant is on the waitlist. Waiting to be suggested a spot.
 SUGGESTING - Registrant is currently being suggested an opened spot.
 DECLINED - Registration has been declined.
 ENROLLED - Registrant has been enrolled to a suggested spot.

members.name: waitingResource
members.doc:
Resource to be waitlisted for.
 Currently only supports session ID.

members.name: leave
members.doc: Whether the registrant can leave the waitlist.

members.name: enroll
members.doc: Whether the registrant can book from the waitlist.

members.name: waitingResources
members.doc: List of sessions (waitingResources) with active waitlists.

members.name: registrations
members.doc: List of registrants to the waitlist.

members.name: status
members.doc:
The Waitlist's current status:
 IDLE - Waiting for a cancellation that will free up a spot in the session.
 SUGGESTING - Currently suggesting a free spot to a registrant in the waitlist. The service will keep suggesting until the end of the list is reached, or until all free spots are filled.
 OPEN_TO_ALL - Once we got to the end of the list - booking is opened for the session, and any registrant on the list can book.

members.name: waitingResource
members.doc: The waitlisted session ID.

members.name: timeWindowMinutes
members.doc: Waitlisted session's "suggesting" time window. Defined as part of the service's booking policy.

members.name: capacity
members.doc: Waitlisted session's capacity. Defined as part of the service's booking policy.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • SHORT_TEXT - Short text. This is the default value type.
  • LONG_TEXT - Long text
  • CHECK_BOX - a text that represent the check box value: if selected the value is "true", otherwise "false".

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • COMPLETE - nothing left to pay.
  • PENDING_CASHIER - cashier order id exists. waiting for callback
  • REJECTED - rejected checkout request
  • READY - initial state of non-cashier flow, expect balance adjustment
  • CANCELED - canceled CHECKOUT
  • REFUNDED
  • PENDING_MERCHANT
  • WIX_PAY_FAILURE
  • PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID - Offline transaction, will be complete when explicitly updated to balance mark as paid
  • PENDING_BUYER - Transaction actually started, cause of pending can be fraud check at provider side, long bank transfer, etc.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CREATED
  • PENDING_MERCHANT
  • COMPLETE
  • FAILED - cashier is unavailable or failed processing
  • DECLINED
  • PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS - The address is determined by the business address as set by the owner in the site’s general settings.
  • OWNER_CUSTOM - The address is determined by the owner.
  • CUSTOM - The address is determined and managed elsewhere

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_PLATFORM
  • WEB
  • MOBILE_APP

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_ACTOR
  • BUSINESS
  • CUSTOMER

Booking status. read-only. Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING_CHECKOUT
  • CONFIRMED
  • CANCELED
  • PENDING
  • PENDING_APPROVAL
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • WAITING
  • SUGGESTING
  • DECLINED
  • ENROLLED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • IDLE
  • SUGGESTING
  • OPEN_TO_ALL
